entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Parent

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
